hm.binkley.util

Interface Converter.Conversion<T,E extends Exception>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the converted type
    E - the exception type on failed converstion, use RuntimeException if none
    Enclosing class:
    Converter
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface Converter.Conversion<T,E extends Exception>
    Converts a string property value into a typed object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T convert(String value)
      Converts the given property value into a typed object.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        T convert(@Nonnull
          String value)
   throws E extends Exception
        Converts the given property value into a typed object.
        Parameters:
        value - the property value, never missing
        Returns:
        the typed object
        Throws:
        E - if conversion fails
        E extends Exception
